participant_1.background:
I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong.
I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
i m deathly terrified of heights.
i want to be a famous photographer.
i wear glasses that are cateyes.

participant_2.background:
My parents are supportive of my career as a translator.
I spend my free time training and relaxing.
i am a mom with two sons and a husband.
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well, thanks! How are you doing?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm just hanging out with my family.
That sounds nice. I wish I could spend more time with my family, but my work schedule is hectic.
What do you do for work?
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in learning another language.
It's definitely a lot of fun! I get to learn about different cultures and meet new people.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play music, take pictures, and spend time with my partner.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to play music, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
I'm sorry to hear that. Music is such a great way to relax and de-stress.
It is! I'm hoping to get back into it someday.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
